title: Downloading Troubles: Mess Up My Data Plan
body:
I have been getting trouble downloading the game many, MANY times. It has been a very big problem to have the ability to download the game in one single time. The patcher needs the ability to PAUSE and RESUME the download. It could be a very big improvement if you don't have the time or if you just have a slow data connection like me. I have downloaded around 2500 MB like 3 times and it is a huge bummer to see that you have to download them again while you are on a limited data plan. "I just wanna play, man."

So... RITO plz... Hear my plea.

replies.body:
Since you're looking to suggest a feature rather than looking for troubleshooting assistance, I recommend reposting this to the [**Miscellaneous Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) where it is better suited.

Let me know if you have any questions.
